body: So basically Sachi had or have someone she loves who look older and smoke the other tobacco. Now if Kei was able to smell the other tobacco for me it tells me that sachi got in touch with that man and to the imagination what they did. Kei took advantage of it even when she knew what was happening and fell in love with sachi but they didnt ended up together🤨

Plot is...let's just say no happy ending (I don't know why, but while everywhere else, I typically prefer sad endings, in hentai, I prefer happy endings, don't really know why), art is really good, but the combination of the 2 is REALLY good. 10/10
sigh... my heart is in pieces grrrr
